Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Deity , Politician , Quiet Council , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: APOCALYPSE, �???????�, PROFESSOR X: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, listed characters can use Probability Control. If 2+ are on the map, opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire can't use Mind Control, Incapacitate, Barrier, and Probability Control. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
02
TEAM UP: ACOLYTES OR BROTHERHOOD OF MUTANTS THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Magneto is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] Once per turn, when Magneto attacks only characters with the X-Men keyword, after resolutions generate an object for Magneto to hold and then give him a RANGE Object Action as FREE. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
03
TEAM UP: X-MEN OR BROTHERHOOD THEMED TEAMS: [After establishing themed teams, if Magneto is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Magneto attacks only characters with the Ruler keyword or that can use Leadership, after resolutions remove an action token from him and give each hit character an action token. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
04
TEAM UP: ACOLYTES THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the Acolytes keyword gain the Brotherhood of Mutants keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
EXECUTING MOIRA’S PLAN: Energy Shield/Deflection. Mastermind, but he may choose a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire instead of adjacent.
BREAKING HUMAN NORMS: Leadership. // FREE: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character within range that attacked Magneto or damaged a friendly character with the X-Men keyword since your last turn. Place Magneto such that he can make a range attack targeting the chosen character, then do so targeting only that character.
